for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = []
    m = []
    for i in range(n):
        (id, vote) = map(str, input().split())
        l.append(id)
        if vote == '+':
            m.append(1)
        else:
            m.append(-1)
    dictio = dict(zip(l, m))
    li = list(dictio.values())
    print(sum(li))

for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    (n1, s) = ([], [])
    sm = 0
    for i in range(n):
        (a, b) = map(str, input().split())
        n1.append(a)
        s.append(b)
    l1 = set(n1)
    l4 = list(l1)
    l2 = n1[::-1]
    l3 = s[::-1]
    for i in range(len(l4)):
        ind = l2.index(l4[i])
        if l3[ind] == '+':
            sm = sm + 1
        else:
            sm = sm - 1
    print(sm)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    x = int(input())
    l = []
    m = []
    sum = 0
    for i in range(x):
        (a, b) = map(str, input().split())
        l.append(a)
        m.append(b)
    g = list(set(l))
    l.reverse()
    for i in range(len(g)):
        res = l.index(g[i])
        res = len(l) - res - 1
        if m[res] == '+':
            sum += 1
        else:
            sum -= 1
    print(sum)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    l = []
    m = []
    j = 0
    k = 0
    while k < n:
        (s, p) = input('').split()
        if s not in l:
            l.append(s)
            m.append(p)
            j = j + 1
        if s in l:
            re = l.index(s)
            m[re] = p
        k = k + 1
    count = 0
    print(m.count('+') - m.count('-'))

for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    (l1, l2, l5, l6) = ([], [], [], [])
    for i in range(n):
        (x, y) = input().split()
        l1.append(x)
        l2.append(y)
    l3 = l1[::-1]
    l4 = l2[::-1]
    for (x, y) in zip(l3, l4):
        if x not in l5:
            l5.append(x)
            l6.append(y)
    r1 = l6.count('+')
    r2 = l6.count('-')
    print(r1 - r2)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    l = []
    s = []
    for j in range(n):
        (a, b) = input().split()
        l.append(a)
        s.append(b)
    se = set(l)
    l = l[::-1]
    s = s[::-1]
    res = 0
    for i in se:
        if s[l.index(i)] == '+':
            res = res + 1
        else:
            res = res - 1
    print(res)

for t in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    d = {}
    s = 0
    for i in range(n):
        (x, y) = map(str, input().split(' '))
        d[x] = y
    l = list(d.values())
    c1 = l.count('-')
    c2 = l.count('+')
    s = c2 - c1
    print(s)

a = int(input())
for i in range(a):
    l1 = []
    n = int(input())
    for j in range(n):
        l1.append(input().split(' '))
    l1.reverse()
    summ = 0
    name = []
    for j in range(n):
        if l1[j][0] not in name:
            name.append(l1[j][0])
            summ += 1 if l1[j][1] == '+' else -1
    print(summ)

for t in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    j = []
    l = []
    for i in range(n):
        (s, k) = map(str, input().split())
        l.append(s)
        l.append(k)
        j.append(s)
    j = list(set(j))
    l = l[::-1]
    p = []
    for i in j:
        q = l.index(i)
        p.append(l[q - 1])
    ans = 0
    for i in p:
        if i == '+':
            ans += 1
        else:
            ans -= 1
    print(ans)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    N = int(input())
    dct = dict()
    for __ in range(N):
        x = input().split()
        userid = x[0]
        vote = int(x[1] == '+')
        if vote == 0:
            vote = -1
        dct[userid] = vote
    print(sum(dct.values()))

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    d = dict()
    for i in range(n):
        s = input().split()
        d[s[0]] = s[1]
    s = list(d.values())
    s1 = s.count('+')
    s2 = s.count('-')
    print(s1 - s2)
